text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: It's so frustrating~……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: During the race, I messed up so many times! I couldn't run the way I wanted to at all……Aaaah, there's so much to reflect on……!
I think placing 3rd in your first G1 is a fantastic result though…… But I see, you aren't satisfied with this result.
I think placing 3rd in your first G1 is a fantastic result though…… But I see, you aren't satisfied with this result.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'm nowhere near satisfied with this……! I can't be satisfied with this result!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I want to be able to get even better results. So I can become who I want to be……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I guess it would be becoming an 『Uma Musume that everyone looks up to』――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……I really admire them. My senpais on the Triple Tiara route.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Inspiration, courage, dreams…… Sparkly things like that are what my senpais have given me.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 『I want to run like that. I want to be strong, dazzling, and move people's hearts, just like that!』 ……Those are the inspirations they've given me.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I believe that's exactly what their senpais also gave to them…… and that's what I feel connects them all together.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: That's why, with everything they've given me, I want to become part of that too. Next time, I want to be the one that inspires someone!
……Having a lot to reflect on means that there's a lot of room to grow for next time. So you can become who you want to be, let's work hard, Kraft!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yeah! ……Ah! But……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: You can't just focus on me all the time though, right? Since next up, is Cesario's debut race……!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: We have a lot of preparations to do before the end of next month, don't we? Cesario-san, are you prepared?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Of course. ……Trainer, you don't have to hold back one bit, I'm looking forward to it.
choice_data_list: Right, I got it. We'll go for it!
Right, I got it. We'll go for it!

text_block_list.text: And so, December 25th, a Christmas debut, approached. Cesario was――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Huu, huuu……Haaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Live Announcer
text_block_list.text: With 200m left, Cesario pulls away! Now the lead has changed to Cesario! It's Cesario!!

text_block_list.name: Live Announcer
text_block_list.text: Goal!! First place is Cesario, it's Cesario! She marks her debut with a spectacular victory!!
Cesario! Good work in your debut. Congrats on 1st place! It was a really good run……!
esario! Good work in your debut. Congrats on 1st place! It was a really good run……!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer……thank you very much for the words of praise. ……However, all I've done is just finish my first race.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I intend to continue doing my best without letting my guard down, so I'll leave it to you to keep up the strict guidance.
Even though she just won, without even a smile on her face, Cesario bowed her head. She was an Uma Musume who embodied the concept of stoicism and fortitude……!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Okay, well then! Merry Christmas♪ Ah, I baked a cake so, is it fine if I start cutting it?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: I was busy with preparation for my debut race so I left it all to you, but I really wanted to do something…… Truthfully, I really love making sweets!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Fufu, for this one~…… I even put some Santa-san candies on top of it……since it's an opportunity, King-san! Please have some♪
……Night time after her debut race. To coincide with that, Team <Ascella> was holding a Christmas party, but――

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……Wait, wait. Wait just a minute――!

text_block_list.name: Teammates
text_block_list.text: Who are you!?!?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Oh come on, it's Cesario obviously~! Yay, yay, Cesario's cake~! I've been looking forward to it~♪

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Be careful not to get cream on your nose again, Kraft. Ah, Trainer too, do you have any favorite fruits?
Really……are you really Cesario……!? How should I put it, um, you have a completely different aura about you……!?
Really……are you really Cesario……!? How should I put it, um, you have a completely different aura about you……!?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Ah……now that you mention it, ever since I joined the team I've just been so focused the whole time…… I guess this is the first time I've really relaxed?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Cesario is someone who has a really drastic on-off switch, you see~!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: No, is this really the same dimension as a simple on-off switch……?
A party with the team, filled with unexpected surprises. As the boisterous, joyful laughs continued, Christmas night eventually started drawing to a close……

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Fufu……King-san's laying on the sofa, out like a light~. She didn't even wake up when Trainer-san moved her.

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: All the way up until today, she was working really hard to plan this party after all……She's a really good team leader, isn't she?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: You're right. But, hopefully she doesn't catch a cold like this…… Trainer, do you have anything that can be used as a blanket?
Let's see……Ah, my coat is on that hangar over there, so can you use that? Thanks, Cesario.
Let's see……Ah, my coat is on that hangar over there, so can you use that? Thanks, Cesario.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: No problem. ……Oh, huh? Excuse me, these were under your coat, is this……?
I was planning on giving them out later……they're presents for everyone. It's nothing too fancy though.
I was planning on giving them out later……they're presents for everyone. It's nothing too fancy though.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh, from Trainer-san!? Waaaaah-……!! Thank you very much-!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer……I'm sorry, I probably should have prepared something too.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……can we just say that my debut win is your present for now? Can you forgive me with that for now? Fufuu.
(……once more I can't help but think that Kraft and Cesario are both really kind. Not only that, but they're both really talented……)
(……once more I can't help but think that Kraft and Cesario are both really kind. Not only that, but they're both really talented……)
(But, when I remember that……I can't help but be more curious. Why did these two choose a team like <Ascella> which was already on the decline?)
(But, when I remember that……I can't help but be more curious. Why did these two choose a team like <Ascella> which was already on the decline?)
If there was some kind of meaning behind it, I should learn about it for the future. Thinking that, I asked them after training one day.
When I did, they both looked at each other and smiled, then――

text_block_list.name: Kraft & Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……we thought it couldn't be anyone else but you.
